data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Hilmand, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hilmand, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Hilmand, Afghanistan to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6288 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Hilmand, Afghanistan, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Hilmand, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Baloch, Western people.
Spirit, teach the church in the state of Hilmand to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Father, convict the 230 believers in Hilmand to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Over 99.98 percent of the people of Hilmand are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

location.name: Hilmand
location.cities_list: Lashkar Gāh, Gereshk, Sangīn, ‘Alāqahdārī Dīshū, Markaz-e Ḩukūmat-e Darwēshān
